channel.title: Identity on Dr. Juan Carlos Galán Hernández
channel.description: Recent content in Identity on Dr. Juan Carlos Galán Hernández

item.title: Generative Writing (WJ #9)
item.description: I’m member of a community that enjoys the art and animation that comes from japan. In other words, I’m an Otaku. I knew the term Otaku when I was in high school, after I was already into this culture of giant robots and mythical heroes for years. Where honor and dreams are the goal and the struggle to achieve them the journey. In other words, stories filled with heroes in a journey.
